item.title: By: Dominho12
item.dc:creator: Dominho12
item.description: Journey and Subnautica are similar in the fact that they are visually pleasing, but journey is more of a puzzle/platformer and Subnautica is a more survival game, I couldn't say about Dishonored but i've heard great things about it
item.content:encoded: Journey and Subnautica are similar in the fact that they are visually pleasing, but journey is more of a puzzle/platformer and Subnautica is a more survival game, I couldn’t say about Dishonored but i’ve heard great things about it
